title: Morning Check-in
details: Successfully finalized negotiations with Company C and signed the contract. This is the result of 3 months of negotiation.

title: Morning Review
categoryTitle: Company A proposal didn't resonate due to price point
details: Submitted proposal to Company A but received feedback that it exceeds budget. They pointed out that we're 15% higher than competitors.

title: Post-lunch Check
categoryTitle: Progress delayed waiting for B's work
details: Proposal creation for Company D is stalled waiting for B's technical specification document. Need to submit today, but B is busy with other projects.

title: Afternoon Consultation
categoryTitle: Adjust number of projects B is handling
details: B is currently handling 5 projects and is clearly over capacity. Would like to consider redistributing to other members.

title: Previous Day Achievement
categoryTitle: New lead acquired through Company E referral
details: Company E representative introduced us to another company, and a meeting is scheduled for next week. Referral sales are starting to show results.

title: Previous Day Challenge
categoryTitle: Cannot schedule meeting with Company F decision maker
details: Have good relationship with Company F point of contact, but haven't been able to schedule meeting with decision maker for 3 weeks.

title: Two Days Ago Achievement
categoryTitle: Successful first meeting with Company G
details: First meeting with Company G showed strong interest, and technical demo is scheduled for next meeting.

title: Three Days Ago Consultation
details: Would like to discuss balance between existing project follow-up and new customer development. Current project closing is taking up time.

title: 会議での交渉方針
details: Change meeting strategy to present results first, then price, to avoid friction experienced previously.

title: 会議での交渉方針
details: Our allocated time with Company A has expired.

title: 会議での交渉方針
categoryTitle: Secure decision from Company A today
details: Primary objective for today's meeting with Company A is to get them to make a final decision.

title: 海岸復旧と業務進捗確認
details: We got a letter from them to sell the amount, restored the coast, and closed the agreement.

title: 海岸復旧と業務進捗確認
categoryTitle: Delay in Mr. B's work affecting J
details: J is quite serious because of the delay in Mr. B's work.

title: 海岸復旧と業務進捗確認
details: I want to consult with the manager immediately because J is quite serious about waiting for Mr. B's work.

title: 成果重視のプレゼン戦略
details: During the last interaction, starting the conversation by discussing the price point caused friction.

title: 成果重視のプレゼン戦略
categoryTitle: New discussion approach: Results first, then price
details: A new strategy is proposed for today's discussion: begin with 'results' (成果) first, and then transition to 'price' (価格), to avoid the friction encountered previously.

title: 提案会議の議事録作成
details: The assistant outlined key discussion points for the proposal meeting: 1. Meeting purpose: Introduce new proposal to Company B. 2. Key points discussed: What was the proposal about, any key features or benefits mentioned. 3. Next steps or decisions needed: What to move forward with or decide in the next meeting.
